nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.fetch

Interface FetchServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FetchService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FetchServiceImpl

    public interface FetchServiceLocal
extends FetchService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

      E      		 reload(E entity, Relationship... fetch)
      Fetches the give relationships for the given entity, forcing the entity to be reloaded from the database, ignoring any possibly existing cache When entity is null, returns null
